name: Yoga Brunch at the Studio by C+C
description:
Join us for a peaceful, Saturday morning yoga session with Nishprah, followed by a yummy breakfast spread from C+C featuring Hello Tempayy 
 
The scrumptious brunch menu: 
 
Welcome Drink : Lemongrass + Ginger Hot Infusion Tea. 
 
Tempeh Chorizo on a bed of miso feta + herby green peas with sourdough bread on the side. 
 
Smoky Oyster Mushroom Quinoa + Lentil Salad 
 
Banana bread cubes 
 
Date: 31st August 2024, Saturday 
 
Reporting Time: 9.45 am 
 
Venue: the Studio by Copper + Cloves, Domlur 
 
*Be sure to bring a yoga mat for the session and a water bottle to stay hydrated!

location.name:
the Studio by Copper + Cloves
4th Floor, 167, 2nd Stage, 2nd Cross, Shankarnag Rd, Domlur, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560071

name: Upper-body Calisthenics Workshop
description:
Join us for a 90-minute empowering workshop designed exclusively for women to master the fundamentals of upper body calisthenics. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refine your skills, this session will focus on building strength, improving form, and gaining confidence in your bodyweight training. Together, we'll cover essential exercises like push-ups, dips, and pull-ups, breaking them down step-by-step to ensure you leave with a solid foundation. Come ready to challenge yourself, learn new techniques, and connect with like-minded women on the same journey toward a stronger, fitter you!  
 
Post the session, you can enjoy some refreshing kombucha from Atmosphere Studio on the house! 
 
Date: 1st Septembr 2024, Sunday 
 
Reporting Time: 9.45 am 
 
Venue: CaliOG, Koramangla 
 
Call or WhatsApp Saachi (9513334690) for any queries 
 
*please carry a water bottle to keep you hydrated

location.name:
CaliOG
84, 1st C Main Rd, Jakkasandra, 1st Block Koramangala, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560034

name: Fifty and Strong - Morning Yoga for 50+ (3 days a week)
description:
FIFTY & Strong is an online workout program designed specifically for the people above the ages 50. The program is ideal to help this crowd get started with their fitness journey. The classes will be conducted over Google Meet and are a mix of bodyweight strength basics and yoga. 
 
Focus of the program: 
* Flexibility and Strength Building 
* Slow-paced, physio recommended workouts to improve health 
* Yoga Balanace and Breath Training for relaxation for the mind 
* Movements to avoid the risk of falls and injuries 
* Low-impact cardio sessions  
 
USP: 
* Two coaches per session  
* 10 minutes of community engagement at the end of the session - dedicated games and activities to address senior loneliness  
* Easy to join - 2 steps and held over Google Meet 
 
Batches: 
 
Morning Batch:  
* Monday - Wednesday - Thursday  
* Timings: 7 am - 8 am 
 
Start Date : 2nd September 
 
Book Soon!
